Countersong.Name: Countersong
Countersong.Note: ' Allies within 30 feet may use your perform check instead of their save. Max 10 rounds sustain. '

Fascinate.Name: Fascinate
Fascinate.Note: ' Fascinate '+(1+floor((thisclasslevel-1)/3))+' creatures within 90 feet. Sustain max: '+thisclasslevel+' rounds. '

Inspire Competence.Name: Inspire Competence
Inspire Competence.Note: ' Allies within 30 feet gain +2 competence bonus to checks with a skill. Max sustain 2 minutes. '

Inspire Courage.Name: Inspire Courage
Inspire Courage.Note: ' Allies who hear and for 5 rounds after hearing add +'+(1+floor((thisclasslevel-2)/6))+' morale bonus to weapon attack and damage rolls and saves vs. charm and fear. '

Inspire Greatness.Name: Inspire Greatness
Inspire Greatness.Note: ' Up to '+floor((thisclasslevel-9)/3)+' allies, including you, gain temp HP as if they had 2d10 extra hit dice, +2 competence bonus to attack rolls, and +1 competence bonus to fortitude saves '

Inspire Heroics.Name: Inspire Heroics
Inspire Heroics.Note: ' Up to '+floor((thisclasslevel-15)/3)+' allies, including you, gain a +4 morale bonus to saves and +4 dodge bonus to AC. Lasts 5 rounds after hearing. Requires a full round to take affect. '

Song of Freedom.Name: Song of Freedom
Song of Freedom.Note: ' After 1 minute of concentration and music, one ally (not you) within 30 feet is affected as with break enchantment '

Suggestion.Name: Suggestion
Suggestion.Note: ' As the spell. Will save DC = '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Charisma-10)/2))+'. '

Suggestion (Mass).Name: Suggestion (Mass)
Suggestion (Mass).Note: ' As suggestion, but you may affect any creature you have fascinated. '

Bardic Knowledge.Name: Bardic Knowledge
Bardic Knowledge.Note: ' Roll a check. Common knowledge: 10, Uncommon: 20, Obscure: 25, Very Obscure: 30 '

Elemental Shape.Name: Elemental Shape
Elemental Shape.Note: ' As alternate form, transform into a small, medium'+if(thisclasslevel>=20, ", large, or huge", ", or large")+' elemental. '

Nature Sense.Name: Nature Sense
Nature Sense.Note: ' +2 bonus to Knowledge(Nature) and Survival checks. '

Resist Nature's Lure.Name: Resist Nature's Lure
Resist Nature's Lure.Note: ' +4 bonus to saves vs. spell-like abilities of fey. '

Thousand Faces.Name: Thousand Faces
Thousand Faces.Note: ' Change appearance but not possessions as disguise self '

Timeless Body.Name: Timeless Body
Timeless Body.Note: ' Ability score penalties due to age no longer apply. Does not prolong life. '

Trackless Step.Name: Trackless Step
Trackless Step.Note: ' Leave no tracks in natural setting, if you wish. '

Wild Shape.Name: Wild Shape
Wild Shape.Note: ' As alternate form, change into a small '+if(thisclasslevel>=15,", medium, large, or huge", if(thisclasslevel>=8,", medium, or large","or medium"))+' creature'+if(thisclasslevel>=12," or plant","")

Aura of Courage.Name: Aura of Courage
Aura of Courage.Note: ' Immune to fear, and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus vs. fear effects '

Divine Grace.Name: Divine Grace
Divine Grace.Note: ' Add charisma bonus ('+max(0, floor((Charisma-10)/2)+') to all saves. '

Remove Disease.Name: Remove Disease
Remove Disease.Note: ' Remove disease as the spell '+floor((thisclasslevel-3)/3)+' times per week. (Manager cannot track weekly uses, you can enter them here manually) '

Smite Evil.Name: Smite Evil
Smite Evil.Note: ' gain +'+max(0,floor((Charisma-10)/2))+' bonus to hit, +'+thisclasslevel+' to damage on one attack, wasted if target not evil. '
Smite Evil.Flavor Text:
'
+'+max(0,floor((Charisma-10)/2))+' bonus to hit, +'+thisclasslevel+' to damage on one attack, wasted if target not evil. '

Turn Undead.Name: Turn Undead
Turn Undead.Note: ' Turn undead as a cleric 3 levels lower ('+(thisclasslevel-3)+') '

Fifth Favored Enemy.Name: Fifth Favored Enemy
Fifth Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Listen, Sense Motive, Spot, Survival, and weapon damage rolls vs. chosen foe. '

First Favored Enemy.Name: First Favored Enemy
First Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Listen, Sense Motive, Spot, Survival, and weapon damage rolls vs. chosen foe. '

Fourth Favored Enemy.Name: Fourth Favored Enemy
Fourth Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Listen, Sense Motive, Spot, Survival, and weapon damage rolls vs. chosen foe. '

Second Favored Enemy.Name: Second Favored Enemy
Second Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Listen, Sense Motive, Spot, Survival, and weapon damage rolls vs. chosen foe. '

Third Favored Enemy.Name: Third Favored Enemy
Third Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Listen, Sense Motive, Spot, Survival, and weapon damage rolls vs. chosen foe. '

Camouflage.Name: Camouflage
Camouflage.Note: ' You may hide in natural terrain, even if it does not provide cover or concealment. '

Evasion.Name: Evasion
Evasion.Note: ' With a successful Reflex save, take no damage if the save would normally reduce damage by half. '

Hide in Plain Sight.Name: Hide in Plain Sight
Hide in Plain Sight.Note: ' You may hide in natural terrain even while being observed. '

Swift Tracker.Name: Swift Tracker
Swift Tracker.Note: ' Track at move speed without penalty. Track at double move speed at -10 instead of -20. '

Wild Empathy.Name: Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.Note: ' Diplomacy check: 1d20+'+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+' to affect animal attitude, as a diplomacy check. '

Woodland Stride.Name: Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.Note: ' Move without hindrance through natural terrain. '

Greater Two Weapon Fighting.Name: Greater Two Weapon Fighting
Greater Two Weapon Fighting.Note: ' Gain the G.T.W.F. feat (gain a third off-hand attack with full-attack) '

Improved Precise Shot.Name: Improved Precise Shot
Improved Precise Shot.Note: ' Gain the I.P.S. feat (ingore cover and concealment when firing your bow) '

Improved Two Weapon Fighting.Name: Improved Two Weapon Fighting
Improved Two Weapon Fighting.Note: ' Gain the I.T.W.F feat (gain a second off-hand attack when full-attacking) '

Manyshot.Name: Manyshot
Manyshot.Note: ' Gain the manyshot feat (fire extra arrows when single-attacking) '

Rapid Shot.Name: Rapid Shot
Rapid Shot.Note: ' Gain the Rapid Shot feat (Extra attack when full attacking with bow) '

Two Weapon Fighting.Name: Two Weapon Fighting
Two Weapon Fighting.Note: ' Gain the TWF feat (extra off-hand attack when full-attacking) '

Bonus Item Creation Feat.Note: ' Choose a item creation feat and edit this power to fill out details '

Bonus Metamagic Feat.Note: ' Choose a metamagic feat and edit this power to fill out details '

Spell Lists.Level 2: Alter Self, Cats Grace, Darkness, Foxs Cunning, Illusory Script, Invisibility, Pass Without Trace, Spider Climb, Undetectable Alignment

Spell Lists.Level 4: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance, Dimension Door, Freedom of Movement, Glibness, Greater Invisibility, Locate Creature, Modify Memory, Poison

Death Attack (Kill).Name: Death Attack (Kill)
Death Attack (Kill).Note: ' Study for 3 rounds and damage with a sneak attack an unaware foe to force a fortitude save-or-die. '
Death Attack (Kill).Flavor Text:
'
Fortitude save DC: '+(10+thisclasslevel+floor((Intelligence-10)/2))+'
Failure means death. Success means normal sneak damage. '

Death Attack (Paralyze).Name: Death Attack (Paralyze)
Death Attack (Paralyze).Note: ' Study for 3 rounds and damage with a sneak attack an unaware foe to force a fortitude save-or-become-helpless. '
Death Attack (Paralyze).Flavor Text:
'
Fortitude save DC: '+(10+thisclasslevel+floor((Intelligence-10)/2))+'
Failure means helpless for '+(1d6+thisclasslevel)+' rounds. '

Hide in Plain Sight.Name: Hide in Plain Sight
Hide in Plain Sight.Note: ' Hide even while observed. Hide an any shadow but your own within 10 feet, even if there is no normal cover or concealment. '

Improved Uncanny Dodge.Name: Improved Uncanny Dodge
Improved Uncanny Dodge.Note: ' Cannot be flanked. Only rogues 4 levels higher than your total class levels from classes that grant uncanny dodge can sneak attack you when flanking you. '

Poison Resistance.Name: Poison Resistance
Poison Resistance.Note: ' Gain a +'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' bonus to saves vs. poison. '

Poison Use.Name: Poison Use
Poison Use.Note: ' May apply poison with no chance of accident. '

Uncanny Dodge.Name: Uncanny Dodge
Uncanny Dodge.Note: ' Don not lose dex bonus to AC when flat-footed or vs. invisible opponents. '

Spell Lists.Level 1: Cause Fear, Corrupt Weapon, Cure Light Wounds, Doom, Inflict Light Wounds, Magic Weapon, Summon Monster I
Spell Lists.Level 2: Bulls Strength, Cure Moderate Wounds, Darkness, Death Knell, Eagles Splendor, Inflict Moderate Wounds, Shatter, Summon Monster II
Spell Lists.Level 3: Contagion, Cure Serious Wounds, Deeper Darkness, Inflict Serious Wounds, Protection from Energy, Summon Monster III
Spell Lists.Level 4: Cure Critical Wounds, Freedom of Movement, Inflict Critical Wounds, Poison, Summon Monster IV

Aura of Despair.Name: Aura of Despair
Aura of Despair.Note: ' Enemies within 10 feet take a -2 penalty to all saves. '

Aura of Evil.Name: Aura of Evil
Aura of Evil.Note: ' Aura detected by detect evil determined by your class level ('+thisclasslevel+') '

Command Undead.Name: Command Undead
Command Undead.Note: ' Command undead as a cleric 2 levels lower ('+(thisclasslevel-2)+') '

Dark Blessing.Name: Dark Blessing
Dark Blessing.Note: ' Apply Charisma bonus (+'+max(0,floor((Charisma-10)/2))+') to all saves. '

Maginot Line.Name: Maginot Line
Maginot Line.Note: ' Apply poison to weapons with no chance of accident. '

Smite Good.Name: Smite Good
Smite Good.Note: ' Add +'+max(0,floor((Charisma-10)/2))+' to hit and +'+thisclasslevel+' to damage on one attack. Wasted if target not good. '
Smite Good.Flavor Text:
'
+'+max(0,floor((Charisma-10)/2))+' to hit and +'+thisclasslevel+' to damage on next attack. Wasted if target not good. '

Countersong.Name: Countersong
Countersong.Note: ' (Aud) Allies within 30 feet may use your perform in place of their save vs. sonic or linguistic magic; those affected gain saves but must use your perform '

Deadly Performance.Name: Deadly Performance
Deadly Performance.Note: ' (Aud, Vis) One target that can see and hear for 1 full round saves or dies. Staggered even if they live. '
Deadly Performance.Flavor Text:
'
Will save DC: '+(10+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+floor(thisclasslevel/2))+'
Success: Target staggered for '+(1d4)+' rounds.
Failure: Die. '

Dirge of Doom.Name: Dirge of Doom
Dirge of Doom.Note: ' (Aud, Vis) Enemies within 30 feet of your continuing performance are shaken with no save. '

Distraction.Name: Distraction
Distraction.Note: ' (Vis) You and allies within 30 can use your perform in place of a save vs illusions (figment or pattern), if higher. Those under such effects gain a save, but must use your perform. '

Fascinate.Name: Fascinate
Fascinate.Note: ' (Aud, Vis) Fascinate up to '+(1+floor((thisclasslevel-1)/3))+' creature(s) within 90 feet. '
Fascinate.Flavor Text:
'
Save DC: '+(10+floor((Charisma-10)/2+floor(thisclasslevel/2))+'
Failure: sits quietly to listen, reaction saves at -4, gain a save vs. effect if threatened.
Success: '+token.name+' can't fascinate target for 24 hours. '

Frightening Tune.Name: Frightening Tune
Frightening Tune.Note: ' (Aud) Enemies within 30 feet must save or become frightened and flee as long as they can hear you. '
Frightening Tune.Flavor Text:
'
Will save DC: '+(10+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+floor(thisclasslevel/2))+'
Success: Immune for 24 hours.
Failure: Target frightened and flees as long as they can hear the performance. '

Inspire Competence.Name: Inspire Competence
Inspire Competence.Note: ' (Aud) An ally within 30 feet gains a +'+(1+floor((thisclasslevel+1)/4))+' competence bonus to checks with a particular skill. '

Inspire Courage.Name: Inspire Courage
Inspire Courage.Note: ' (Aud or Vis) You and perceiving allies gain +'+(1+max(0, floor((thisclasslevel+1)/6))+' as a morale bonus to saves and as a competence bonus to attack and weapon damage rolls. '

Inspire Greatness.Name: Inspire Greatness
Inspire Greatness.Note: ' (Aud, Vis) Up to '+floor((thisclasslevel-6)/3)+' willing allies gain two d10 temporary hit dice, +2 competence bonuses to attacks, and +1 competence bonus to fortitude saves. '

Inspire Heroics.Name: Inspire Heroics
Inspire Heroics.Note: ' (Aud, Vis) Up to '+floor((thisclasslevel-12)/3)+' allies within 30 feet gain +4 morale bonus to saves and +4 dodge bonus to AC. Lasts as long as performance can be heard. '
Inspire Heroics.Flavor Text:
'
+4 morale bonus to saves and +4 dodge bonus to AC. Lasts as long as performance can be heard. '

Mass Suggestion.Name: Mass Suggestion
Mass Suggestion.Note: ' (Aud) As suggestion, but affects any number of fascinated creatures. '
Mass Suggestion.Flavor Text:
'
Will save DC '+(10+floor(thisclassleve/2)+floor((Charisma-10)/2))+' or do as you are told! '

Soothing Performance.Name: Soothing Performance
Soothing Performance.Note: ' (Aud, Vis) Requires 4 rounds of performance. All within 30 feet and perceiving for the duration are affected as by mass cure serious wounds, and are cured of fatigue, sickness, and shakened. '
Soothing Performance.Flavor Text:
'
All within 30 feet, seeing and hearing for 4 continuous rounds lose fatigued, sickened, shaken and are cured for '+(3d8+thisclasslevel)+' HP. '

Suggestion.Name: Suggestion
Suggestion.Note: ' (Aud) Affect any creature already fascinated by your performances as by the suggestion spell. '

Bardic Knowledge.Name: Bardic Knowledge
Bardic Knowledge.Note: ' Add half class level ('+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+') to all knowledge checks, and knowledge can be used untrained. '

Jack of All Trades.Name: Jack of All Trades
Jack of All Trades.Note: ' You may use untrained skills. '+if(thisclasslevel>=16,"All skills are treated as class skills","")+' '+if(thisclasslevel>=19," You may take 10 on any skill check.","")+'. '

Lore Master.Name: Lore Master
Lore Master.Note: ' You may take 10 on any knowledge check you are trained in. Standard action to take 20. '

Versatile Performance.Name: Versatile Performance
Versatile Performance.Note: ' Choose ('+(1+floor((thisclasslevel-2)/4))+') perform skill(s). Use that performance modifier in place of associated skill modifiers when making checks. '

Well-Versed.Name: Well-Versed
Well-Versed.Note: ' You gain a +4 bonus to saves vs. bardic performances, as well as sonic and linguistic effects. '

Aura.Name: Aura
Aura.Note: ' Your aura corresponds powerfully to your deity's for purposes of alignment detection. '

Channel Energy.Name: Channel Energy
Channel Energy.Note: ' Channel '+floor((thisclasslevel+1)/2)+'d6 points of energy. Affect either living or undead creatures within 30 feet. '

Electricity Resistance.Name: Electricity Resistance
Electricity Resistance.Note: ' You gain '+if(thisclasslevel>=20, "immunity to electricity", if(thisclasslevel>=12, "electricity resistance 20", "electricity resistance 10"))+'. '

Lightning Arc.Name: Lightning Arc
Lightning Arc.Note: ' Ranged touch within 30 feet deals 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' electricity damage. '

Animal Companion.Name: Animal Companion
Animal Companion.Note: ' You gain an animal companion. Effective druid level = '+(thisclasslevel-3)+'. '

Animal Lore.Name: Animal Lore
Animal Lore.Note: ' Gain Knowledge (Nature) as a class skill. '

Speak with Animals.Name: Speak with Animals
Speak with Animals.Note: ' Speak with animals, as the spell. '

Artificer's Touch.Name: Artificer's Touch
Artificer's Touch.Note: ' Melee touch deals 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' damage to objects and constructs. Bypasses DR and hardness up to '+thisclasslevel+'. '
Artificer's Touch.Flavor Text:
'
Melee touch. Dmg: '+(1d6+floor(thisclasslevel/2))+'
Bypasses up to '+thisclasslevel+' DR and hardness. '

Dancing Weapons.Name: Dancing Weapons
Dancing Weapons.Note: ' Touch grants weapon the dancing quality for 4 rounds. '

Mending.Name: Mending
Mending.Note: ' Cast mending to repair damaged objects. CL = '+thisclasslevel+'. '

Chaos Blade.Name: Chaos Blade
Chaos Blade.Note: ' Touch imbues weapon with the anarchic quality for '+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' rounds. '

Touch of Chaos.Name: Touch of Chaos
Touch of Chaos.Note: ' Melee touch attack forces target to roll all d20 rolls twice, taking worst result, for 1 round. '
Touch of Chaos.Flavor Text:
'
Melee touch. Target to roll all d20 rolls twice, taking worst result, for 1 round. '

Dazing Touch.Name: Dazing Touch
Dazing Touch.Note: ' Melee touch causes target to be dazed for 1 round. Target immune if HD > '+thisclasslevel+'. '
Dazing Touch.Flavor Text:
'
Melee touch causes target to be dazed for 1 round. Target immune if HD > '+thisclasslevel+'. '

Calming Touch.Name: Calming Touch
Calming Touch.Note: ' Touch heals 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' nonlethal damage and removes fatigued, shaken, and sickened. '
Calming Touch.Flavor Text:
'
Touch heals '+(1d6+floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' nonlethal damage and removes fatigued, shaken, and sickened. '

Unity.Name: Unity
Unity.Note: ' Immediate action. When a spell or effect targets both you and at least one ally in 30 feet, allow your allies to use your save against the effect. Each ally decides before the rolls are made. '
Unity.Flavor Text:
'
Allies affected may opt before rolls are made to use my save modifier instead of theirs. '

Eyes of Darkness.Name: Eyes of Darkness
Eyes of Darkness.Note: ' Your vision is not impaired by lighting conditions, including magic darkness. '

Touch of Darkness.Name: Touch of Darkness
Touch of Darkness.Note: ' Melee touch attack causes target to treat all other creatures as if they have concealment. Effect lasts '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rounds. '

Bleeding Touch.Name: Bleeding Touch
Bleeding Touch.Note: ' Melee touch attack causes 1d6 damage per round for '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rounds or until stopped by a DC15 heal or effect that heals damage. '
Bleeding Touch.Flavor Text:
'
Melee touch attack causes 1d6 damage per round for '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rounds or until stopped by a DC15 heal or effect that heals damage.
Round 1 dmg: '+1d6+'. '

Death's Embrace.Name: Death's Embrace
Death's Embrace.Note: ' You heal damage instead of taking it from channeled negative energy, even if energy targets undead. '

Destructive Aura.Name: Destructive Aura
Destructive Aura.Note: ' Emit a 30 foot aura. Attacks against targets within (including you) gain morale bonus of '+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' to damage and all critical threats are confirmed. '

Destructive Smite.Name: Destructive Smite
Destructive Smite.Note: ' Make a single attack witha  morale bonus on damage = '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+'. You must declare smite before making the attack '
Destructive Smite.Flavor Text:
'
Morale bonus of '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' to damage on next attack. '

Acid Dart.Name: Acid Dart
Acid Dart.Note: ' Ranged touch attack within 30 feet deals 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' acid damage. '
Acid Dart.Flavor Text:
'
Ranged touch attack within 30 feet
Dmg: '+(1d6+floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' acid damage. '

Acid Resistance.Name: Acid Resistance
Acid Resistance.Note: ' You gain '+if(thisclasslevel>=20, "immunity to acid", if(thisclasslevel>=12, "acid resistance 20", "acid resistance 10"))+'. '

Scythe of Evil.Name: Scythe of Evil
Scythe of Evil.Note: ' Touch grants a weapon the unholy quality for '+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' rounds. '
Scythe of Evil.Flavor Text:
'
Touch grants a weapon the unholy quality for '+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' rounds. '

Touch of Evil.Name: Touch of Evil
Touch of Evil.Note: ' Touch attack causes sickened (duration '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rounds). '

Fire Bolt.Name: Fire Bolt
Fire Bolt.Note: ' Ranged touch attack within 30 feet deals 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' damage. '

Fire Resistance.Name: Fire Resistance
Fire Resistance.Note: ' You gain '+if(thisclasslevel>=20, "immunity to fire", if(thisclasslevel>=12, "fire resistance 20", "fire resistance 10"))+'. '

Divine Presence.Name: Divine Presence
Divine Presence.Note: ' Emit a 30 foot aura. Allies within are affected as by sanctuary (DC: '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Wisdom-10)/2))+'). Activation is a standard action. Ends if you attack. '

Positive Channeler.Name: Positive Channeler
Positive Channeler.Note: ' When you channel positive energy to harm undead, the save DC is increased by 2. '

Touch of Glory.Name: Touch of Glory
Touch of Glory.Note: ' Your touch grants target ability to opt to apply a bonus of '+thisclasslevel+' to a Charisma based skill or ability check. They can hold this option for up to 1 hour. '

Holy Lance.Name: Holy Lance
Holy Lance.Note: ' Touch gives a weapon the holy quality for '+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' rounds. '
Holy Lance.Flavor Text:
'
Touch gives a weapon the holy quality for '+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' rounds. '

Touch of Good.Name: Touch of Good
Touch of Good.Note: ' Touch grants a +'+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' sacred bonus to attack rolls, skill and ability checks, and saves for 1 round. '
Touch of Good.Flavor Text:
'
Touch grants a +'+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' sacred bonus to attack rolls, skill and ability checks, and saves for 1 round. '

Healer's Blessing.Name: Healer's Blessing
Healer's Blessing.Note: ' All your cure spells are treated as empowered when used for healing. '

Rebuke Death.Name: Rebuke Death
Rebuke Death.Note: ' Touch a creature that is below 0 HP to heal for 1d4+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+'. '
Rebuke Death.Flavor Text:
'
Touch heals for 1d4+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' damage, if target is below 0 HP. '

Lore Keeper.Name: Lore Keeper
Lore Keeper.Note: ' With a successful touch attack, gain knowledge of target weaknesses as though your relevant knowledge check was '+(15+thisclasslevel+floor((Wisdom-10)/2))+ '. '

Remote Viewing.Name: Remote Viewing
Remote Viewing.Note: ' Use clairvoyance/clairaudience as a spell-like ability. '

Scholarship.Name: Scholarship
Scholarship.Note: ' You treat all knowledge skills as class skills. '

Staff of Order.Name: Staff of Order
Staff of Order.Note: ' Your touch gives a weapon the axiomatic quality for '+floor((thisclasslevel-4)/4)+' rounds. '

Touch of Law.Name: Touch of Law
Touch of Law.Note: ' A willing creature touched treats all attack, skill check, and save d20 rolls as 11s for 1 round. '

Freedom's Call.Name: Freedom's Call
Freedom's Call.Note: ' Emit a 30 foot aura. Allies within are not confused, grappled, frightened, panicked, paralyzed, pinned, or shaken. Effects return if they leave the aura or it ends. '

Liberation.Name: Liberation
Liberation.Note: ' Ignore magical impediments to your movement, as if by freedom of movement. '

Bit of Luck.Name: Bit of Luck
Bit of Luck.Note: ' Touched willing creature rolls all d20s twice for one round, taking the best result each time. '

Good Fortune.Name: Good Fortune
Good Fortune.Note: ' After rolling a d20, but before the result is known, reroll the d20 and take the second roll. '

Aura of Madness.Name: Aura of Madness
Aura of Madness.Note: ' Emit a 30 foot aura of madness. Enemies in area are affected by confusion (Will DC '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Wisdom-10)/2))+'). Effect ends if affected leave area. Save: immune for 24 hours. '

Vision of Madness.Name: Vision of Madness
Vision of Madness.Note: ' For 3 rounds, target of your melee touch gains a bonus of +'+max(1,floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' to either attack rolls, saves, or skill checks, and a comparable penalty to the other two. '

Dispelling Touch.Name: Dispelling Touch
Dispelling Touch.Note: ' You can use targeted dispel magic with a melee touch attack. '

Hand of the Acolyte.Name: Hand of the Acolyte
Hand of the Acolyte.Note: ' Your melee weapon flies and attacks a target within 30 feet. Treated as a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, but use wisdom instead of dexterity for the attack roll (damage still strength). '

Inspiring Word.Name: Inspiring Word
Inspiring Word.Note: ' Speak to a creature in 30 feet. Target receives a +2 morale bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saves for '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rounds. '
Inspiring Word.Flavor Text:
'
Target receives a +2 morale bonus to attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saves for '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rounds. '

Leadership.Name: Leadership
Leadership.Note: ' Gain the leadership feat. Gain +2 to your leadership score. '

Bramble Armor.Name: Bramble Armor
Bramble Armor.Note: ' You are covered in thorns. Anyone striking you with unarmed attacks or non-reach melee weapons takes 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel)+' damage. '

Wooden Fist.Name: Wooden Fist
Wooden Fist.Note: ' Free action to turn your fists to thorned wood. Unarmed strikes don't provoke, deal lethal damage, and do +'+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' damage. '

Aura of Protection.Name: Aura of Protection
Aura of Protection.Note: ' Emit a 30' aura that grants you and allies within a +'+floor((thisclasslevel-4)/4)+' deflection bonus to AC and resistance '+if(thisclasslevel<14,5,10)+' against all elements. '

Resistant Touch.Name: Resistant Touch
Resistant Touch.Note: ' Transfer your save bonus to a touched ally for one minute. '

Save Bonus.Name: Save Bonus
Save Bonus.Note: ' You have a +'+(1+floor(thisclasslevel/5))+' resistance bonus to all saving throws. '

Gentle Rest.Name: Gentle Rest
Gentle Rest.Note: ' Touch staggers for a round. Targets already staggered are put to sleep for 1 round. Undead are staggered for '+floor((Wisdom-10)/2)+' rounds. '

Ward Against Death.Name: Ward Against Death
Ward Against Death.Note: ' 30 foot aura provides immunity to death effects, energy drain, and negative level causation. Suppresses but does not remove negative levels. '

Blast Rune.Name: Blast Rune
Blast Rune.Note: ' Create a blast rune in an adjacent square. Creatures entering take 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage. Rune invisible and lasts '+thisclasslevel+' rounds or till discharge. '
Blast Rune.Flavor Text:
'
Create a blast rune in an adjacent square. Creatures entering take 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage. Rune invisible and lasts '+thisclasslevel+' rounds or till discharge. '

Scribe Scroll.Name: Scribe Scroll
Scribe Scroll.Note: ' You gain scribe scroll as a bonus feat '

Spell Rune.Name: Spell Rune
Spell Rune.Note: ' Attach a spell 1 level below your highest spell level to one of your runes. '
Spell Rune.Flavor Text:
'
Attach a spell 1 or more levels below max to blast rune. '

Might of the Gods.Name: Might of the Gods
Might of the Gods.Note: ' Add a+'+thisclasslevel+' enhancement bonus to your strength. '

Strength Surge.Name: Strength Surge
Strength Surge.Note: ' Touched target gains a+'+max(1,floor(thisclassleve/2))+' bonus to melee attacks, strength-based skill and maneuver checks, and strength checks. '
Strength Surge.Flavor Text:
'
Touched target gains a+'+max(1,floor(thisclassleve/2))+' bonus to melee attacks, strength-based skill and maneuver checks, and strength checks. '

Nimbus of Light.Name: Nimbus of Light
Nimbus of Light.Note: ' Emit 30 feet of light. Acts as daylight spell. Undead within radius take '+thisclasslevel+' damage per round. '
Nimbus of Light.Flavor Text:
'
30 feet of light. Acts as daylight spell. Undead within radius take '+thisclasslevel+' damage per round. '

Suns Blessing.Name: Suns Blessing
Suns Blessing.Note: ' When channeling to harm undead, add '+thisclasslevel+' to damage dealt, and ignore channel resistance. '

Dimensional Hop.Name: Dimensional Hop
Dimensional Hop.Note: ' Teleport as many feet as you have remaining. '

Copycat.Name: Copycat
Copycat.Note: ' Create an illusory double. Works as a single mirror image. Lasts '+thisclasslevel+' rounds or until popped. Max one at a time. '
Copycat.Flavor Text:
'
Lookie there! There be two of me! '

Master Illusion.Name: Master Illusion
Master Illusion.Note: ' Affect yourself and allies within 30 feet as by the veil spell. '
Master Illusion.Flavor Text:
'
Self and allies within 30 affected as by veil.
Will save DC to disbelieve: '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Wisdom-10)/2))+'. '

Tricky Skills.Name: Tricky Skills
Tricky Skills.Note: ' Bluff, Disguise, and Stealth are class skills for you. '

Battle Rage.Name: Battle Rage
Battle Rage.Note: ' Touch grants a +'+max(1,floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' bonus to melee damage for 1 round. '
Battle Rage.Flavor Text:
'
Touch grants +'+max(1,floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' bonus to melee damage for 1 round. '

Weapon Master.Name: Weapon Master
Weapon Master.Note: ' Expend a round to gain the use of a combat feat for 1 round. '
Weapon Master.Flavor Text:
'
Gains the use of any one combat feat for 1 round. '

Cold Resistance.Name: Cold Resistance
Cold Resistance.Note: ' You '+if(thisclasslevel>=20, "are immune to cold", if(thisclasslevel>=12, "have resist cold 20", "have resist cold 10"))+'. '

Icicle.Name: Icicle
Icicle.Note: ' Fire an icicle at a target within 30 feet. 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' damage. '

Lightning Lord.Name: Lightning Lord
Lightning Lord.Note: ' Standard action to call down up to as many bolts of lightning as you have. Targets must be within 30 feet of each other. Each does 3d6 damage, or 3d10 in stormy areas. '
Lightning Lord.Flavor Text:
'
Each bolt does 3d6 or 3d10 in stormy weather. '

Storm Burst.Name: Storm Burst
Storm Burst.Note: ' Deal 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' damage and impose -2 penalty to attacks for one round vs. a target within 30 feet. '
Storm Burst.Flavor Text:
'
Target takes 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' damage and has a -2 penalty to attacks for one round. '

Nature Sense.Name: Nature Sense
Nature Sense.Note: ' You gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge(Nature) and Survival checks. '

Resist Nature's Lure.Name: Resist Nature's Lure
Resist Nature's Lure.Note: ' You gain a +4 bonus to saves vs. spells ans SLAs of fey, as well as vs. spells that target or use plants (e.g. entangle) '

Thousand Faces.Name: Thousand Faces
Thousand Faces.Note: ' Change appearance at will as by the spell alter self. '

Timeless Body.Name: Timeless Body
Timeless Body.Note: ' Your life is not extended, but while you live you suffer no ability penalties due to age. '

Trackless Step.Name: Trackless Step
Trackless Step.Note: ' You leave no trail unless you wish to in natural surroundings. '

Venom Immunity.Name: Venom Immunity
Venom Immunity.Note: ' You are immune to all poisons. '

Wild Empathy.Name: Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.Note: ' Influence animals or unintelligent magical beasts with a check that functions as a diplomacy check. '
Wild Empathy.Flavor Text:
'
Influence Animal: '+(1d20+floor((Charisma-10)/2))+'
Influence Mag. Beast: '+(1d20+floor((Charisma-10)/2)-4)+' (Int must be 1 or 2) '

Woodland Stride.Name: Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.Note: ' You are not slowed by natural undergrowth. '

Beast Shape.Name: Beast Shape

EDIT YOUR WILD SHAPE POWERS TO USE 0 SHIFTS","")

Plant Shape.Name: Plant Shape
Plant Shape.Note: ' as the spell plant shape '+if(thisclasslevel>=12, "III", if(thisclasslevel>=10, "II", "I"))+'. '

Electricity Resistance.Name: Electricity Resistance
Electricity Resistance.Note: ' You gain '+if(thisclasslevel>=20, "immunity to electricity", if(thisclasslevel>=12, "electricity resistance 20", "electricity resistance 10"))+'. '

Lightning Arc.Name: Lightning Arc
Lightning Arc.Note: ' Ranged touch within 30 feet deals 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' electricity damage. '

Animal Companion.Name: Animal Companion
Animal Companion.Note: ' You gain an animal companion. Effective druid level = '+(thisclasslevel-3)+'. '

Animal Lore.Name: Animal Lore
Animal Lore.Note: ' Gain Knowledge (Nature) as a class skill. '

Speak with Animals.Note: ' Speak with animals, as the spell. '

Aura of Faith.Name: Aura of Faith
Aura of Faith.Note: ' Your attacks and all against targets within 10 feet of you are treated as good aligned for overcoming DR. '

Aura of Good.Name: Aura of Good
Aura of Good.Note: ' Detection spells discover a good aura equal to '+thisclasslevel+'. '

Aura of Justice.Name: Aura of Justice
Aura of Justice.Note: ' Spend 2 uses of smite to grant the power for 1 minute to all non-evil allies within 10 feet. '

Aura of Resolve.Name: Aura of Resolve
Aura of Resolve.Note: ' Immune to charm spells and SLAs. Allies within 10 feet gain a +4 to saves vs. same. '

Aura of Righteousness.Name: Aura of Righteousness
Aura of Righteousness.Note: ' You gain DR'+if(thisclasslevel>=20,"10","5")+'/evil. You are immune to compulsion and allies within 10 feet gain +4 morale bonus on saves versus same. '

Divine Health.Name: Divine Health
Divine Health.Note: ' You are immune to all diseases, even magical. '

Holy Champion.Name: Holy Champion
Holy Champion.Note: ' When you smite evil against an evil outsider, it is subject to a banishment spell. This ends the smite effect. Your lay on hands and channel energy abilties are maximized. '

Mercy.Name: Mercy
Mercy.Note: ' You may choose '+floor(thisclasslevel/3)+' mercies that heal/cure additional effects when you lay on hands. EDIT THIS POWER TO ENTER THEM HERE. '

Smite Evil.Name: Smite Evil
Smite Evil.Note: ' Declare an evil target. Gain bonuses of +'+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+' to hit and +'+thisclasslevel+' to damage and a deflection bonus of +'+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+' to AC vs. this target, until it dies or you rest. Wasted if target is not evil. '
Smite Evil.Flavor Text:
'
+'+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+' to hit and to AC vs. my evil target.
+'+thisclasslevel+' to all damage rolls.
(+'+(2*thisclasslevel)+' dmg if target is an outsider(evil), an evil dragon, or undead) '

Channel Positive Energy.Name: Channel Positive Energy
Channel Positive Energy.Note: ' Emit a burst of 30 feet. Choose to affect creatures or undead. Creatures are healed and undead harmed by '+floor((thisclasslevel+1)/2)+'d6. Will save for half damage. DC = '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Charisma-10)/2))+'. '
Channel Positive Energy.Flavor Text:
'
30 foot burst. Heal creatures or harm undead.
Amount: '+d(floor((thisclasslevel+1)/2),6)+'
Save DC: '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Charisma-10)/2))+'. '

Summon Divine Mount.Name: Summon Divine Mount
Summon Divine Mount.Note: ' Call your celestial steed to your side. '
Summon Divine Mount.Flavor Text:
'
A mighty steed appears at my side! '

Weapon Spirit.Name: Weapon Spirit
Weapon Spirit.Note: ' Add +'+floor((thisclasslevel-2)/3)+' worth of enhancement bonus to any existing on your weapon. Add pure enhancement up to +5 max or special qualities. Lasts '+thisclasslevel+' minutes. '

First Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, Survival, and weapon attack and damage rolls vs. _______ creatures. EDIT THIS ABILITY TO ENTER CREATURE TYPE. '

Fourth Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, Survival, and weapon attack and damage rolls vs. _______ creatures. '

Second Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, Survival, and weapon attack and damage rolls vs. _______ creatures. '

Third Favored Enemy.Name: Third Favored Enemy
Third Favored Enemy.Note: ' +2 bonus to Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, Survival, and weapon attack and damage rolls vs. _______ creatures. '

First Favored Terrain.Name: First Favored Terrain
First Favored Terrain.Note: ' +2 to Knowledge (Geography), Perception, Stealth, and Survival in _____ terrain. EDIT THIS SKILL TO ENTER TERRAIN CHOICE. '

Fourth Favored Terrain.Name: Fourth Favored Terrain
Fourth Favored Terrain.Note: ' +2 to Knowledge (Geography), Perception, Stealth, and Survival in _____ terrain. '

Second Favored Terrain.Name: Second Favored Terrain
Second Favored Terrain.Note: ' +2 to Knowledge (Geography), Perception, Stealth, and Survival in _____ terrain. '

Third Favored Terrain.Name: Third Favored Terrain
Third Favored Terrain.Note: ' +2 to Knowledge (Geography), Perception, Stealth, and Survival in _____ terrain. '

Camouflage.Name: Camouflage
Camouflage.Note: ' Hide in even without cover in one of your favored terrains '

Evasion.Name: Evasion
Evasion.Note: ' Reflex saves that normally would halve damage result in no damage. '

Hide in Plain Sight.Name: Hide in Plain Sight
Hide in Plain Sight.Note: ' Hide in a favored terrain even while observed. '

Improved Evasion.Name: Improved Evasion
Improved Evasion.Note: ' Failed reflex saves that would halve damage still result in half damage. '

Master Hunter.Name: Master Hunter
Master Hunter.Note: ' Move at full speed while tracking at no penalty. Gain the master hunter shot ability 1/day against each type of favored enemy. '

Master Hunter Shot.Name: Master Hunter Shot
Master Hunter Shot.Note: ' 1/day against each favored enemy type, standard action attack at full BAB and damage normally. Force save or die/knockout if you hit. '
Master Hunter Shot.Flavor Text:
'
Fortitude Save DC: '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Wisdom-10)/2))+'
Fail: Die or take nonlethal = current HP (my choice).
Success: damage negated. '

Quarry.Name: Quarry
Quarry.Note: ' Designate target. You can take '+if(thisclasslevel>=19,"20","10")+' on survival checks vs. this target and all criticals are confirmed. You gain a +'+if(thisclasslevel>=19,"4","2")+' insight to attacks. Prove the quarry is dead to designate another in '+if(thisclasslevel>=19,"10 minutes","1 hour")+'. Dismiss at designate in 24 hours. '
Quarry.Flavor Text:
'
I can take '+if(thisclasslevel>=19,"20","10")+' on survival checks vs. my designated target and all criticals are confirmed. I gain a +'+if(thisclasslevel>=19,"4","2")+' insight to attacks vs. this target. '

Swift Tracker.Name: Swift Tracker
Swift Tracker.Note: ' Move at speed while tracking at no penalty. Mover at double speed for only -10. '

Wild Empathy.Name: Wild Empathy
Wild Empathy.Note: ' 1d20+'+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+' to influence animals or magical beast with Int of 1 or 2. '

Woodland Stride.Name: Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.Note: ' Move through any natural undergrowth without impediment. '

Improved Precise Shot.Name: Improved Precise Shot
Improved Precise Shot.Note: ' Gain the improved precise shot feat. '

Point Blank Shot.Name: Point Blank Shot
Point Blank Shot.Note: ' This power does nothing at all to protect you for '+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+' rounds '

Shot on the Run.Name: Shot on the Run
Shot on the Run.Note: ' Gain the shot on the run feat. '

Animal Companion.Name: Animal Companion
Animal Companion.Note: ' Gain an animal companion as a level '+(thisclasslevel-3)+' druid. '

Grant Favor.Name: Grant Favor
Grant Favor.Note: ' Grant your favored enemy bonus against one creature to all allies in 30 feet. Lasts '+floor((Wisdom-10)/2)+' rounds. '
Grant Favor.Flavor Text:
'
Allies in 30 feet get my favored enemy bonus against a single target. Lasts '+floor((Wisdom-10)/2)+' rounds. '

Greater Two Weapon Fighting.Name: Greater Two Weapon Fighting
Greater Two Weapon Fighting.Note: ' Gain the greater two weapon fighting feat. '

Improved Shield Bash.Name: Improved Shield Bash
Improved Shield Bash.Note: ' Gain the improved shield bash feat. '

Improved Two Weapon Fighting.Name: Improved Two Weapon Fighting
Improved Two Weapon Fighting.Note: ' Gaint the improved two weapon fighting feat. '

Two Weapon Defense.Name: Two Weapon Defense
Two Weapon Defense.Note: ' Gain the two weapon defense feat. '

Two Weapon Fighting.Name: Two Weapon Fighting
Two Weapon Fighting.Note: ' Gain the two weapon fighting feat. '

Two Weapon Rend.Name: Two Weapon Rend
Two Weapon Rend.Note: ' Gain the two weapon rend feat. '

Aberrant Form.Name: Aberrant Form
Aberrant Form.Note: ' You are immune to critical hits and sneak attacks, have DR 5/-- and blindsight 60. '

Acidic Ray.Name: Acidic Ray
Acidic Ray.Note: ' Ranged touch within 30 feet deals 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' acid damage. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' When you cast a spell of the polymorph subschool increase the duration by 50% (min 1 round). Does not stack with extend spell. '

Long Limbs.Name: Long Limbs
Long Limbs.Note: ' When you make a melee touch attack, your reach increases by '+if(thisclasslevel>=17,15,if(thisclasslevel>=11,10,5))+' feet. '

Unusual Anatomy.Name: Unusual Anatomy
Unusual Anatomy.Note: ' You have a '+if(thisclasslevel>=13,50,25)+'% chance to ignore any critical hit or sneak attack against you. '

Added Summoning.Name: Added Summoning
Added Summoning.Note: ' When you summon a creature with the demon subtype or the fiendish template, using a summon monster spell, you summon one additional creature of the same kind. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' Whenever you summon, the summoned gains DR '+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+'/good. Does not stack with pre-existing DR. '

Claws.Name: Claws
Claws.Note: ' Free action, grow claws as natural weapons. You can attack twice with these using the full attack action at your full BAB. These deal 1d'+if(thisclasslevel>=7,6,4)+' (med) or 1d'+if(thisclasslevel>=7,4,3)+' (small).'+if(thisclasslevel>=11, ' The claws are also flaming, dealing +1d6 fire damage.','')+if(thisclasslevel>=5, ' These attacks are treated as magic for purposes of bypassing DR','')+'. '

Demon Resistance.Name: Demon Resistance
Demon Resistance.Note: ' You have ER '+if(thisclasslevel>=9,10,5)+' vs. electricity and a +'+if(thisclasslevel>=9,4,2)+' bonus to saves vs. poison. '

Demonic Might.Name: Demonic Might
Demonic Might.Note: ' You are immune to electricity and poison and have ER 10 vs. fire, cold, and acid. You can telepathically communicate with any creature with a language within 60 feet. '

Strength of the Abyss.Name: Strength of the Abyss
Strength of the Abyss.Note: ' You have a +'+if(thisclasslevel>=17,6, if(thisclasslevel>=13,4,2))+' inherent bonus to Strength. '

Arcane Apotheosis.Name: Arcane Apotheosis
Arcane Apotheosis.Note: ' Metamagic never increases spell casting time. You may use three levels of spell slots to reduce the charges expended from an item with charges by 1. '

Arcane Bond.Name: Arcane Bond
Arcane Bond.Note: ' You bond a familiar or an object as a wizard of your level. Any wizard levels you possess stack with your sorcerer levels to determine the power of the bond. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' When you use any metamagic besides heighten, raise the DC of she spell by +1. (Multiple metamagics gain this only once) '

Metamagic Adept.Name: Metamagic Adept
Metamagic Adept.Note: if(thisclasslevel<20, 'Application of metamagic does not increase the spell casting time.', 'See Arcane Apotheosis')

New Arcana.Name: New Arcana
New Arcana.Note: ' Add a spell from the sorcerer/wizard list to your known spells at 9th, 13th, and 17th levels. '

School Power.Name: School Power
School Power.Note: ' Pick one school of magic. The DC of your spells from this school are increased by 2. Stacks with spell focus. EDIT THIS POWER TO INDICATE YOUR CHOICE. '

Ascension.Name: Ascension
Ascension.Note: ' You are immune to petrification, acid, and cold, and have ER 10 vs. fire and electricity. You gain a +4 racial bonus to saves vs. poison. Wings of heaven can be used indefinitely and you can speak to any creature with a language as per the tongues spell. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' When you cast a summoning spell, the summoned gain DR '+max(1,floor(thisclasslevel/2))+'/evil. Does not stack with pre-existing DR. '

Celestial Resistance.Name: Celestial Resistance
Celestial Resistance.Note: ' You have ER '+if(thisclasslevel>=9, 10, 5)+' vs. acid and cold. '

Conviction.Name: Conviction
Conviction.Note: ' After the die is rolled but before result revealed you may decide to reroll and must take second result. Works for attack rolls, skill and ability checks, and saves. '

Heavenly Fire.Name: Heavenly Fire
Heavenly Fire.Note: ' Ranged touch attack within 30 feet. Heavenly fire has no effect on neutral creatures, but heals good and harms evil for 1d4+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' damage. This is not fire and not subject to ER or DR. A good creature can be healed this way only 1/day. '

Wings of Heaven.Name: Wings of Heaven
Wings of Heaven.Note: ' Gain feathery wings and a 60' (good man.) fly speed for 1 minute per use. '

Auto Penetrate.Name: Auto Penetrate
Auto Penetrate.Note: ' Announce this before you roll to overcome spell resistance. You automatically penetrate and need not roll. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' When you cast a personal range spell you get a bonus to saves equal to the spell level for 1 round. '

Destiny Realized.Name: Destiny Realized
Destiny Realized.Note: ' Critical threats against you confirm only on a natural 20. You auto-confirm any critical hits you get with your spells. '

Fated.Name: Fated
Fated.Note: ' You have a +'+floor((thisclasslevel+1)/4)+' luck bonus to AC and saves during surprise rounds and when unaware of an attack. '

It Was Meant To Be.Name: It Was Meant To Be
It Was Meant To Be.Note: ' After the first roll, but before result is revealed, you can take a reroll, forced to take the second result, on any one attack, critical confirmation, or level check to overcome SR. '

Touch of Destiny.Name: Touch of Destiny
Touch of Destiny.Note: ' Standard action, your touch gives a +'+max(1, floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' insight bonus to attacks, saves, and skill and ability checks for 1 round. '

Within Reach.Name: Within Reach
Within Reach.Note: ' If an attack or spell deals damage to you that would kill you, make a DC 20 will save. Success means you are stabilized at -1 HP, not dead. '

1st Level Choice.Name: 1st Level Choice
1st Level Choice.Note: ' Choose between the following heritages: Black-Acid, Blue-Elect, Green-Acid, Red-Fire, White-Cold, Brass-Fire, Bronze-Elect, Copper-Acid, Gold-Fire, Silver-Cold. (EDIT THIS POWER TO DISPLAY YOUR CHOICE) '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' When you cast spells that deal damage of the energy type associated with your draconic heritage, add +1 damage per die rolled. '

Breath Weapon.Name: Breath Weapon
Breath Weapon.Note: ' Gain a breath weapon determined by your heritage. Deals '+thisclasslevel+'d6 dmg of your energy type. DC '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Charisma-10)/2))+' reflex for half. '

Claws.Name: Claws
Claws.Note: ' Grow claws as a free action. You can get two claw attacks with a full attack. These deal '+if(thisclasslevel>=7,'1d6(med) or 1d4(small)','1d4(med) or 1d3(small)')+' dmg'+if(thisclasslevel>=11,' plus 1d6 dmg of your energy type.','.')+if(thisclasslevel>=5,' These are treated as magic for overcoming DR.','')+' As 1-handed weapons, add 1x your strength modifier to damage. '

Dragon Resistance.Name: Dragon Resistance
Dragon Resistance.Note: ' Gain ER '+if(thisclasslevel>=9, 10, 5)+' vs. your associated energy type and +'+if(thisclasslevel>=15,4,if(thisclasslevel>=9,2,1))+' natural armor '

Power of Wyrms.Name: Power of Wyrms
Power of Wyrms.Note: ' You are immune to paralysis, sleep, and your energy type. You have blindsense 60. '

Wings.Name: Wings
Wings.Note: ' Grow wings as a standard action. 60 foot fly speed with average maneuver. Dismiss as a free. '

1st Level Choice.Name: 1st Level Choice
1st Level Choice.Note: ' Choose between Air-Electricity, Earth-Acid, Fire-Fire, or Water-Cold as your element-energy type. (EDIT THIS POWER TO DISPLAY YOUR CHOICE) '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' When you cast a spell that does energy damage, you may change the energy type to match your element. '

Elemental Blast.Name: Elemental Blast
Elemental Blast.Note: ' In a 20 foot burst deal '+thisclasslevel+'d6 damage of your type. DC '+(10+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' reflex for half. Fail means vulnerable to your energy until the end of your next turn. '

Elemental Body.Name: Elemental Body
Elemental Body.Note: ' You are immune to criticals and sneak attack, as well as damage from your energy type. You gain a special move speed according to your element choice. '

Elemental Ray.Name: Elemental Ray
Elemental Ray.Note: ' Ray of your energy type within 30 feet does 1d6+'+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+' damage. '

Elemental Resistance.Name: Elemental Resistance
Elemental Resistance.Note: ' You have resistance '+if(thisclasslevel>=9,20,10)+' against your energy type. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' +2 to DC when you cast a spell of the compulsion subschool. '

Fey Magic.Name: Fey Magic
Fey Magic.Note: ' After you roll to overcome spell resistance, but before results are revealed, you may choose to reroll. Second roll must be used, even if worse. '

Laughing Touch.Name: Laughing Touch
Laughing Touch.Note: ' Touch causes laughing fit. Target can only take move actions for 1 round. Once affected, target is immune for 24 hours. '

Soul of the Fey.Name: Soul of the Fey
Soul of the Fey.Note: ' Gain immunity to poison and DR 10/cold iron. Animals attack only if compelled by magic. '

Woodland Stride.Name: Woodland Stride
Woodland Stride.Note: ' You are not slowed by any sort of natural plant growth. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' +2 to DC when yoiu cast spells of the charm subschool. '

Corrupting Touch.Name: Corrupting Touch
Corrupting Touch.Note: ' Touch causes target to be shaken and radiate evil as an evil outsider for '+max(1,floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rounds. Multiple touches increase duration. '

Hellfire.Name: Hellfire
Hellfire.Note: ' Call down a column of fire (10 foot radius burst). Deals '+thisclasslevel+'d6 fire damage. DC '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Charisma-10)/2))+' reflex save for half. Good creatures that fail the save are shaken for '+thisclasslevel+' rounds. '

Infernal Resistance.Name: Infernal Resistance
Infernal Resistance.Note: ' You have resist fire '+if(thisclasslevel>=9,10,5)+' and a +'+if(thisclasslevel>=9,4,2)+' bonus to saves vs. poison. '

On Dark Wings.Name: On Dark Wings
On Dark Wings.Note: ' Grow bat wings with a standard action and gain 60 foot fly speed. Dismiss as a free action. '

Power of the Pit.Name: Power of the Pit
Power of the Pit.Note: ' Gain darkvision 60, immunity to fire and poison, and resist 10 vs. cold and acid. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' Whenever you cast a spell with the electricity or sonic descriptor, increaase the save DC by 1. '

Ride the Lightning(Sp).Name: Ride the Lightning(Sp)
Ride the Lightning(Sp).Note: ' Full-round action you become a living lightning bolt and move straight 10x your speed not provoking AoO.  Creatures and objects in your path are affected as by your thunderbolt power.  Creatures do not block your movement, but solid barriers do unless they are reduced to 0 hp.  Duration "+thisclasslevel+' rounds. '

Storm Lord(Ex).Name: Storm Lord(Ex)
Storm Lord(Ex).Note: ' Immune: deafness,stunning,wind effects. Blindsight 120 vs concealment from natural/magical fog, mist or weather.  1/day absorb electricity or sonic attack healing 1 point for every 3 the attack would have dealt. '

Stormchild(Ex).Name: Stormchild(Ex)
Stormchild(Ex).Note: ' At 3rd level, gain resist electricity 5 and resist sonic 5 and treat wind effects as being one step less severe.  At 9th level, wind effects 2 steps less severe and blindsense 60 vs concealment from natural/magical fog, mist, or weather effects. '

Thunderbolt(Sp).Name: Thunderbolt(Sp)
Thunderbolt(Sp).Note: ' 9th level, stroke of lightning from above 5 foot radius, 60 feet high, half electricity, half sonic, Reflex DC '+10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Charisma-10)/2)+' half. Failure defens for 1 round. Range 120 feet. '

Thunderstaff(Sp).Name: Thunderstaff(Sp)
Thunderstaff(Sp).Note: ' Standard action to touch weapon to give SHOCK for '+max(1,floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rnds.  At 9th level, may give SHOCKING BURST but duration halved. '

Bloodline Arcana.Name: Bloodline Arcana
Bloodline Arcana.Note: ' Treat corporeal undead that were once humanoid as humanoids for purposes of what spells affect them. '

Death's Gift.Name: Death's Gift
Death's Gift.Note: ' You have resist cold '+if(thisclasslevel<9,5,10)+' and DR'+if(thisclasslevel<9,5,10)+'/-- versus nonlethal damage. '

Grasp of the Dead.Name: Grasp of the Dead
Grasp of the Dead.Note: ' In a 20 foot burst, skeletal arms from ground cause '+thisclasslevel+'d6 slashing damage (DC '+(10+floor(thisclasslevel/2)+floor((Charisma-10)/2))+' reflex for half). Those that fail cannot move for 1 round. '

Grave Touch.Name: Grave Touch
Grave Touch.Note: ' Touch causes shakened condiiton for '+max(1,floor(thisclasslevel/2))+' rounds. Shaken frightened for 1 round if they have fewer HD than you. '

One of Us.Name: One of Us
One of Us.Note: ' You are immune to cold and have DR 5/--. +4 to saves vs. spells cast by undead. You also begin to physically rot. Undead see you as one of them. Unintelligent undead do not notice you unless you attack. '
